text: Rêve à la lune is a 1905 French silent comedy movie directed by Ferdinand Zecca and Gaston VelleDream of the MoonLiam Burke. The Comic Book Film Adaptation: Exploring Modern Hollywood's Leading Genre and stars Ferdinand Zecca. ==Actors== * Ferdinand Zecca as the drunkard ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1905 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:French silent movies Category:French comedy movies
title: Rêve à la lune
